channel.title: Serverside on Bonkowski.net
channel.description: Recent content in Serverside on Bonkowski.net

item.title: Serverside Swift
item.description: I read this article today on raywenderlich.com, which was fun since I last night started playing around a little with Swift on the server-side. To be able to use Swift on the server-side appeals to me because I really like the language. As earlier mentioned, I started looking into this last night, wanting to replicate a “Mock” server written in Go, just for fun. This server makes it easy for us to simulate a real environment while developing our iOS and Android apps.
